name: Avenue Q Online Trivia | Avenue Q | 10 Questions

questions.text: In "Avenue Q" who is Brian's fiancee?
questions.explanation:
Christmas Eve.

	Brian is the person who sings "I'm not wearing underwear today."

questions.text: In "Avenue Q" who sings the song "If You Were Gay?"
In "Avenue Q" who sings the song "The More You Ruv Someone" with Christmas Eve?
questions.explanation:
Kate Monster.

	Kate sings in the background.

questions.text: In "Avenue Q" which person doesn't like himself because he has no job?
questions.explanation:
Brian.

	The catering company laid him off.

questions.text: In "Avenue Q" who is gonna find his purpose?
questions.explanation:
Princeton.

	"It's a penny." "Hey, it's from the year I was born." "It's a sign."

questions.text: In "Avenue Q" what is NOT mentioned in the song "Schadenfreude"?
questions.correct: clapping when someone gets an answer wrong
options: watching a vegeterian being told she just ate chicken
being stuck on an elevator when somebody shouts "Hold the door"
questions.explanation:
clapping when someone gets an answer wrong.

	Something else that is mentioned is "Exes getting STDs."

questions.text: In "Avenue Q" what is the name of Rod's favorite Book?
questions.explanation:
Broadway Musicals from the 1940s.

	Rod says what his favorite book is at the beginning of the song "If You Were Gay".

questions.text: In "Avenue Q" who hasn't anyone seen for two weeks?
questions.explanation:
Princeton.

	The temp agency fired him for being too depressing on the phone.

questions.text: In "Avenue Q" who sings the line "How many Oriental wives have you got?"
questions.explanation:
Brian.

	That line is in the song "Everyone's a Little Bit Racist".

questions.text: In "Avenue Q" whose life sucks because his roommate irons his underwear?
questions.explanation:
Nicky.

	"You make the small apartment we share a hell."
